title.rendered: NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program for Young Graduates

content.rendered:
Explore endless networking opportunities as a Fresh Graduate with us and contribute to shaping a world that acts in unison.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
  • NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program
  • Aim and Benefits of NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program
  • Requirements for NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program Qualification
  • Application Deadline
  • How to Apply

Join our team and become a catalyst for global progress. Engage in pioneering work on 6G technologies, construct highly efficient architectures, and develop cutting-edge bio-optical sensors. With us, there are no boundaries to what you can achieve. As a company that extends networks to the moon, we constantly push the limits of possibility. Moreover, as you embark on this journey of exploration, you’ll forge an equally expansive career with the autonomy to define your own path.

The pandemic has underscored the vital role of telecommunications networks in society. At Nokia’s Network group, we are at the forefront of a revolution driven by our ambition, innovation, and technical expertise to provide greater and faster network capacity to people worldwide.

NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program

  • Type: Postgraduate
  • Organization: Nokia Foundation
  • Country to study –
  • School to study –
  • Course to study: Not specified
  • State of Origin: 
  • Gender: Men and Women
  • Application Deadline: Not Specified

Aim and Benefits of NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program

What You Will Learn and Contribute To Nokia Field Services

  • Helped with different activities like deployment, integration, acceptance tests, etc.
  • Get involved in network automation projects.
  • Support H&S compliance during project activities

What Is Nokia Looking For From Me

Our company will offer internship opportunities for recently Graduated University Students with the relevant tertiary qualifications to bring a positive attitude and willingness to learn and collaborate.

Requirements for NOKIA Mobile Network MEA Training Program Qualification

Education Recommendations

  • BS: Telecom/ Network / Computer & Software Engineering / Electronics and Communication / Electrics and Electronics Engineering / Data Engineering
  • Excellent English skills: both verbal and written
  • Strong desire to learn & develop himself/herself professionally
  • Excellent verbal & written communication skills

Skills and Requirements

  • Problem Solving skills, including the ability to support improvement projects using processes and tools
  • Result-oriented with a focus on achieving target and deadline
  • Basic knowledge of health and safety and risk assessment.
  • Positive attitude and ability to deliver results with no or minimum supervision

Application Deadline

Ongoing

How to Apply

Interested and qualified? Go to Nokia Foundation on nokia.taleo.net to apply

For more details, visit the Nokia Foundation website
